get.desc: Lists a collection of authorization providers defined within a service instance.

params.name: $filter
params.desc: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.desc: A Collection of the Authorization Provider entities for the specified API Management service instance.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.desc: Deletes specific authorization provider from the API Management service instance.

204.desc: The authorization server settings were successfully deleted.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.desc: Lists a collection of authorization providers defined within a authorization provider.

params.name: $filter
params.desc: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.desc: A Collection of the Authorization entities for the specified Authorization provider.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.desc: Deletes specific Authorization from the Authorization provider.

204.desc: The authorization resource was not found.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.
